name: places/ChIJx2yM5whZwokRqBLxen_SGAM
formattedAddress: 36 E 31st St #701, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 36 E 31st St #701, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I truly love Dr. Khaykis! She truly hears her patients! She cares! When i told her my symptoms she had me do a mri and it showed that i had gallstones! When other doctors had misdiagnosed me in the past saying i had acid reflux and to lose some weight. She even gave me a hug when i came to her office crying because no one was taking me seriously. I had dark urine, claylike stool, and jaundice. I am so glad that there are doctors like her! Go see her for any of your gastro issues she will truly help you!

originalText.text: Dr. Khaykis is the best medical professional that I have ever met. I have been a patient of hers for over 9 years and despite moving out of Manhattan, I still drive from Connecticut to Manhattan for my appointments and procedures. I am so happy with the medical care I receive from her. She is so knowledgeable and thorough in her medical exams.  She is caring, friendly, and kind. She has the best bedside manner and I don't think I have ever caught her in a less than cheery mood! She always returns patient phone calls and never makes you feel rushed. Her assistant, Sonya, is also amazing.

originalText.text: I went to Dr. Khaykis for my routine colonoscopy after being referred by a medical friend and was extremely pleased!  She took time, answered all questions, did great follow-up, and I will be returning to her for my next routine follow-up. Highly recommend.

text.text: I went to Dr. Khaykis for my routine colonoscopy after being referred by a medical friend and was extremely pleased!  She took time, answered all questions, did great follow-up, and I will be returning to her for my next routine follow-up. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Dr. Khaykis has been treating me and my family for many years. She's amazing!!!! She makes me feel more comfortable about managing my condition. Just recently she spent nearly an hour with me and my mother during a visit. Also, she has scoped me multiple times and have had nothing but positive experiences with her.

originalText.text: Dr Khakis is an excellent physician. In addition to her professional and clinical skills, she is warm and caring. She is "patient-centered". I was reassured by her explanations of diagnoses, treatments and procedures. She is an advocate for her patients and seeks the best care for them. Overall, a pleasure to work with her.
